creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: hat with horn on top and water buffalo ears; flap coming off back of the hat; hat has bird pattern around rim; ears have floral and bird patterns on them; each side of horn has a phoenix-like bird; flap in back depicts two people perhaps a bride and groom; in front of them is a pig in clothing dancing next to a monkey wearing clothes; the couple is sitting on a horse
title: Hat
